attributes.action: Discuss evicting the US Military from UK bases!
attributes.additional_details:
Why is the UK Government not deeply concerned about this?

We need to take action so that, in the event of World War 3, the UK is in a much safer state than it is at present!

And don't forget that the weapons most likely to be used against the UK in World War 3 will be nuclear!  I would hate to be the British Prime Minister that allows the UK to become a wasteland as a result of nuclear attack on their watch!
attributes.background: We in the UK do not want to be a target for weapons aimed at US Military installations. Yet in the increasingly likely event of a World War 3 - which is likely to be started as a result of President Trump's antagonistic approach to Foreign Policy - the UK will be amongst the first enemy targets!
